author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Runs a query on  any table or field.
commands.name: cdl-query-logs

commands.description: Runs a query on the threat table according to preset queries.
commands.name: cdl-get-critical-threat-logs

commands.description: Runs a query on traffic table where app_sub_category = "social networking".
commands.name: cdl-get-social-applications

commands.description: Runs a query on the threat table with the query 'SELECT * FROM `firewall.threat` WHERE file_sha_256 = <file_hash>'
commands.name: cdl-search-by-file-hash

commands.description: Searches the Cortex firewall.traffic table. Traffic logs contain entries for the end of each network session.
commands.name: cdl-query-traffic-logs

commands.description: Searches the Cortex panw.threat table, which is the threat logs table for PAN-OS/Panorama.
commands.name: cdl-query-threat-logs

commands.description: Use this command in case your authentication calls fail due to internal call-limit, the command will reset the limit cache.
commands.name: cdl-reset-authentication-timeout

integration.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake provides cloud-based, centralized log storage and aggregation for your organization on premise, virtual (private cloud and public cloud) firewalls, for Prisma Access, and for cloud-delivered services such as Cortex XDR.
integration.name: Cortex Data Lake

description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake provides cloud-based, centralized log storage and aggregation for your on premise, virtual (private cloud and public cloud) firewalls, for Prisma Access, and for cloud-delivered services such as Cortex XDR
name: Cortex Data Lake
